roleset.name: get all tangled up
roleset.note: ENTWINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entwine' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.2. (from entwine.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive, verbal
example.text: Foreign stock markets, with which the U.S. is entwined *trace*, also have ended fixed commissions in recent years.

example.name: passive, adjectival
example.text: The problems of the environment are so interrelated, so inextricably entwined with our current way of life and so large that it is unlikely we will be able to address them effectively unless major changes are made in less than 10 years.
example.arg: with our current way of life
